column1: Smoque BBQ////I eat BBQ everywhere I go and this is one of the top-5 best BBQ joints I've ever eaten at. Lately
column2: only Kansas City Joe's in KC had better and they are about as good as it gets in the world. Try the brisket (sliced) and beans at Smoque
column3: you won't be disappointed. If you don't like a vinegary slaw
column5: but it isn't bad. The only downside is that the restaurant is kind of off the beaten path and both times that we've been there
column6: we ended up driving for a while and parking quite a bit away. It is very close to the "Irving Park" metro stop and I'd recommend that instead of driving.
